title:
Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen;
stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;
descriptions:
Introducing the Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen! This handy tool is perfect for removing ice and frost from your fridge, ensuring optimal performance and efficiency.

Crafted with a durable stainless steel blade and a sturdy PP handle, this ice scraper guarantees high-quality and long-lasting performance. The stainless steel blade effortlessly cuts through ice, while the ergonomic handle provides a comfortable grip for easy handling.

Available in three attractive colors - blue, gray, and pink - this ice scraper adds a touch of style to your kitchen. Please note that the actual color may vary slightly due to monitor and lighting differences.

With a compact size of 17 cm in length and 4.5 cm in width, this ice scraper is designed to fit perfectly in your hand and effortlessly reach all corners of your fridge. The measurement deviation of 1-5mm ensures precise and accurate scraping.

Your purchase includes 1 Fridge Ice Scraper, making it a convenient and practical tool for your household requirements. 

Please note that the actual color may vary due to monitor and lighting effects. However, rest assured that the quality and functionality of this ice scraper remain uncompromised.

Experience the convenience and efficiency of the Stainless Steel Refrigerator Shovel Ice Scraper Removal Deicing Tool Kitchen. Order yours today and keep your fridge ice-free!
